info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 10 at 6:29PM EDT until August 10 at 6:45PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM EDT FOR CENTRAL CHESTERFIELD AND WESTERN HENRICO COUNTIES AND THE CITY OF RICHMOND... At 628 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Laurel to Bon Air to near Moseley, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. These severe storms will be near... Richmond and Lakeside around 635 PM EDT. Virginia Union University, Virginia Commonwealth University, Downtown Richmond and East Highland Park around 640 PM EDT. Bensley and Chesterfield Court House around 650 PM EDT. Chester and Bellwood around 655 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Pocahontas State Park, Solomons Store, Beach, Chamberlayne, Greendale, Roslyn Hills, Dumbarton, Drewrys Bluff, Centralia and Chesterfield. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
